Arguments.Name: sharedOchestratorFolderName
Arguments.Tooltip: The Ochestrator folder name where all credential to be used can be found

Arguments.Name: topLevelOchestratorFolderName
Arguments.Tooltip: The ochestrator folder name where your traget RPA process would run. if left blank the top level tenant folder is used

Arguments.Name: listOfCredentialAssetNamesInSharedFolder
Arguments.Tooltip: is a list of credential asset names stored in the shared folder within UiPath Orchestrator if left blank then program would decide by looking into the shared Ochestrator Folder

Arguments.Name: tagToIdentifyTargetCredentialsWith
Arguments.Tooltip: is a phrase within credential names that helps filter and retrieve all credentials containing that phrase. If left blank, the program will select all available credentials without filtering by name.
